title: New Customer Acquisition - Win-Back
description: A former customer is targeted with a special 'win-back' offer to rejoin.

tasks.description: Identify the former customer in the marketing database and verify the win-back offer details.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the customer is eligible for '50% off for 6 months'.

tasks.description: Create a new account for the customer, applying the special win-back promotion.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates a new account with the promotional code applied.
